title: Slope: A ramp shall have a slope of not lessthan 1 in 8 for vehicular traffic & 1 in12 for pedestrian
clause_text: Slope: A ramp shall have a slope of not lessthan 1 in 8 for vehicular traffic & 1 in12 for pedestrian. It shall be of non-slippery material.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Slope: A ramp shall have a slope of not lessthan 1 in 8 for vehicular traffic & 1 in12 for pedestrian. It shall be of non-slippery material.
